title: Template Hearth
projectSummary: Template Hearth is a modern website template marketplace offering clean, production-ready, and SEO-optimized templates for startups, creators, and small businesses.
overview: Template Hearth is a professional website template store built to deliver high-quality, reusable, and scalable website templates. The platform focuses on performance, SEO, and a minimalist design system to ensure a premium user experience without unnecessary complexity.
objective: The goal was to build a fast, SEO-friendly, and scalable platform where users can easily discover and use production-ready website templates designed for real-world business needs.
solutionStrategy: The platform was built with Next.js to ensure fast rendering and smooth navigation. A custom component-driven design system was developed from scratch to maintain consistency, scalability, and long-term maintainability without relying on paid UI kits.
keyFeatures: Fast and SEO-optimized page rendering
Fully responsive layouts across all devices
Consistent design system with reusable UI components
Clean navigation and intuitive browsing experience
Search-engine-friendly structure and metadata
performanceAndOptimization: All pages were optimized for speed, SEO, and scalability. Best practices such as clean markup, proper heading hierarchy, and efficient routing were applied to improve discoverability and performance.
challengesAndLearnings: The biggest challenge was building a premium-quality product with no budget. By designing a custom UI component library from scratch, I achieved a professional look while strengthening my skills in scalable UI architecture and design consistency.
finalOutcome: Template Hearth showcases my ability to independently design, build, and ship a full-scale web product with strong performance, clean architecture, and attention to detail.
idealUseCases: Startups looking for ready-to-use website templates
Creators and developers seeking reusable designs

meta.title: Template Hearth – Website Template Marketplace Built with Next.js
meta.description: Template Hearth is a high-performance website template marketplace built with Next.js, offering SEO-optimized, production-ready templates for startups, creators, and small businesses.

og.title: Template Hearth – Modern Website Template Marketplace
og.description: Discover clean, scalable, and SEO-friendly website templates built with Next.js for startups and small businesses.

twitter.title: Template Hearth – Website Template Store
twitter.description: A modern template marketplace offering production-ready, SEO-optimized website templates built with Next.js.

title: Adztronaut
projectSummary: Adztronaut is a modern, high-performance advertising agency website designed to deliver a clean, engaging, and conversion-focused user experience.
overview: Adztronaut is a modern advertising agency website built to showcase services, credibility, and portfolio through strategic storytelling and a visually engaging interface. The platform emphasizes performance, responsiveness, and SEO while maintaining a clean and professional design language.
objective: The goal was to transform a provided UI/UX design into a fully functional, pixel-perfect, and production-ready website that delivers fast performance, smooth navigation, and strong conversion flow.
roleAndResponsibilities: Frontend development from provided UI/UX design
solutionStrategy: The website was developed using a component-based frontend architecture to ensure scalability and maintainability. Each section was carefully structured to match the original design while improving performance, accessibility, and SEO. Reusable components were created to maintain consistency across pages and reduce redundancy.
keyFeatures: Multi-slide hero section with smooth transitions
Structured service breakdown for clarity
Credibility-focused About page layout
Detailed case study sections
Testimonial-driven social proof components
Fully responsive and mobile-optimized layouts
performanceAndOptimization: The website was optimized for fast load times, smooth animations, and stable layouts. Best practices were applied to reduce layout shifts, improve responsiveness, and ensure SEO-friendly markup for better search engine visibility.
challengesAndLearnings: One of the key challenges was accurately translating the provided UI/UX design into a live website while maintaining performance and responsiveness. This project strengthened my ability to convert static designs into scalable, production-ready front-end systems with clean code standards.
finalOutcome: Adztronaut demonstrates my capability to turn detailed UI designs into polished, high-performing websites. The project reflects strong attention to detail, frontend architecture skills, and a deep understanding of performance-focused, SEO-friendly development.

meta.title: Adztronaut – Modern Advertising Agency Website
meta.description: Adztronaut is a high-performance advertising agency website built with a modern frontend architecture, focusing on SEO, responsiveness, and conversion-driven design.

og.title: Adztronaut – High-Performance Advertising Agency Website
og.description: A modern, conversion-focused advertising agency website built with clean frontend architecture and SEO best practices.

twitter.title: Adztronaut – Advertising Agency Website
twitter.description: A modern advertising agency website focused on performance, clean UX, and SEO-driven frontend development.

title: GeetBazaar
projectSummary: GeetBazaar is a modern music distribution platform designed to help artists publish, manage, and monetize their music across multiple digital platforms.
overview: GeetBazaar is a full-scale music distribution web platform built to streamline the process of song uploads, metadata management, and release tracking for independent artists and labels. The platform focuses on usability, scalability, and performance while providing a clean and professional dashboard-driven experience.
objective: The objective was to build a scalable and user-friendly music distribution system that allows artists to manage releases, track submissions, and interact with the platform through a secure and well-structured workflow.
solutionStrategy: A modular, component-driven architecture was implemented to handle complex workflows such as multi-song uploads, metadata validation, and admin review processes. The system was designed to be scalable, allowing future expansion for analytics, revenue tracking, and additional distribution features.
keyFeatures: Artist dashboard for managing music releases
Multi-song upload system with structured metadata
Admin panel for release review and management
Role-based access control for employees and admins
Responsive and dashboard-friendly UI
Clean navigation for complex workflows
performanceAndOptimization: The platform was optimized for handling large forms, file uploads, and dashboard interactions efficiently. Clean state management, optimized API calls, and responsive layouts ensure smooth performance across devices.
challengesAndLearnings: Managing complex form data, file uploads, and role-based workflows was a key challenge. This project strengthened my experience in building scalable MERN-based systems with real-world business logic and long-term maintainability.
finalOutcome: GeetBazaar demonstrates my ability to work on production-level platforms involving complex workflows, dashboards, and role-based systems. The project highlights strong full-stack skills, problem-solving ability, and attention to scalability.

meta.title: GeetBazaar – Music Distribution Platform for Artists
meta.description: GeetBazaar is a scalable music distribution platform built with the MERN stack, enabling artists to upload, manage, and distribute their music through a modern dashboard.

og.title: GeetBazaar – Modern Music Distribution Platform
og.description: A full-scale music distribution web platform built with modern MERN architecture and dashboard-driven workflows.

twitter.title: GeetBazaar – Music Distribution Platform
twitter.description: A modern MERN-based music distribution platform designed for artists, labels, and scalable content management.

title: Growcial Bull
projectSummary: Growcial Bull is a modern, multi-page website built for a trading academy to showcase courses, blogs, and educational resources with a professional and SEO-optimized structure.
overview: Growcial Bull is a modern, responsive website developed for a trading academy that educates students and aspiring traders in real stock market concepts. The platform presents courses, educational blogs, milestones, and resources in a clean and engaging format, focusing on credibility, clarity, and accessibility.
objective: The objective was to build a multi-page, mobile-first website that effectively communicates the academy’s mission, educational offerings, and expertise while ensuring strong SEO performance and smooth user experience.
roleAndResponsibilities: Component reusability and clean code practices
solutionStrategy: A component-based frontend architecture was used to ensure scalability and consistency across pages. The layout was designed with a mobile-first approach, clear call-to-actions, and structured content sections to guide users through courses, resources, and community engagement.
keyFeatures: Multi-page website with clear information hierarchy
Hero section highlighting academy values and vision
Dynamic blog system for trading strategies and insights
Accordion-based FAQ section for common questions
Newsletter subscription integration
Contact form with callback request option
Smooth navigation with conversion-focused CTAs
performanceAndOptimization: The website was optimized for responsiveness, fast loading, and SEO visibility. Clean markup, structured content, and optimized layouts ensure a smooth experience across all devices and improved discoverability in search engines.
challengesAndLearnings: Designing a content-heavy educational website required careful information structuring to maintain clarity without overwhelming users. This project strengthened my ability to balance educational content with usability and conversion-focused design.
finalOutcome: The completed website provided Growcial Bull with a strong digital presence, helping the brand build credibility, attract new students, and effectively showcase expertise in equity and derivatives trading education.

meta.title: Growcial Bull – Modern Crypto & Trading Academy Website
meta.description: Growcial Bull is a modern, SEO-optimized trading academy website built with React and Tailwind CSS to showcase courses, blogs, and educational resources.

og.description: A modern, responsive website for a trading academy, focused on education, credibility, and SEO-driven frontend development.

twitter.description: A professional trading academy website built with React and Tailwind CSS, optimized for SEO and user engagement.

title: SaaSPeria
projectSummary: SaaSPeria is a premium multi-page Next.js SaaS website template designed for project management, remote collaboration, and productivity-focused startups, featuring responsive layouts and smooth animations.
overview: SaaSPeria is a modern, multi-page SaaS website template built with Next.js 16 and Tailwind CSS. Designed for startups and productivity platforms, the template focuses on responsive layouts, modular components, and polished UX animations using HearthMotion. It is fully frontend/UI ready, SEO-optimized, and structured for future API integration.
objective: The objective was to create a professional, reusable SaaS website template that developers can use as a foundation for project management or productivity platforms, ensuring clean code, smooth UX, and responsive design.
roleAndResponsibilities: Frontend design and implementation using Next.js 16
Building modular and reusable UI components
Animating transitions and scrolling with HearthMotion
Structuring multi-page layouts for SaaS platforms
Preparing frontend for future API integration
solutionStrategy: A component-driven architecture was adopted for maximum reusability, scalability, and maintainability. HearthMotion (Lenis + Animate.css) was used for smooth scrolling and animated transitions. SEO best practices were applied across all pages, and the layout was fully responsive for desktop and mobile devices.
keyFeatures: Multi-page SaaS layout with Home, Features, Pricing, Contact, Auth pages
Modular and reusable frontend components
Auth-ready UI (Login, Register, Forgot Password)
Smooth scrolling and animated transitions with HearthMotion
SEO-friendly and performance-optimized frontend
Clean structure for future API integration
performanceAndOptimization: All pages were optimized for fast loading, smooth animations, and mobile responsiveness. Clean markup, reusable components, and SEO-friendly structure ensure excellent performance and discoverability.
challengesAndLearnings: Ensuring smooth animations across multiple pages while keeping a modular and reusable frontend structure was a key challenge. This project enhanced my skills in building performance-focused, scalable SaaS templates with polished UX.
finalOutcome: SaaSPeria serves as a ready-to-use SaaS website template demonstrating modern frontend architecture, responsive design, smooth animations, and SEO-optimized layouts. It provides a professional starting point for startups and developers.

meta.title: SaaSPeria – Next.js Multi-Page SaaS Website Template
meta.description: SaaSPeria is a premium Next.js SaaS website template with multi-page layouts, smooth HearthMotion animations, and modular components. SEO-optimized and frontend-ready for developers.

og.title: SaaSPeria – Modern Next.js SaaS Template
og.description: A premium multi-page SaaS template built with Next.js 16 and Tailwind CSS, featuring smooth animations and reusable frontend components.

twitter.title: SaaSPeria – Next.js SaaS Website Template
twitter.description: A modern, frontend-ready SaaS website template with SEO-friendly, responsive layouts and smooth HearthMotion animations.

title: Aaronn
projectSummary: Aaronn is a premium multi-page portfolio template for visual designers, UI/UX professionals, and creatives, designed to showcase work clearly and professionally with smooth animations and responsive layouts.
overview: Aaronn is a modern portfolio website template tailored for creative professionals. It emphasizes minimal yet expressive design, clear project case studies, and a smooth user experience. The template provides freelancers and agencies with a polished online presence while keeping the structure modular, reusable, and easy to customize.
objective: The goal was to create a multi-page, responsive portfolio template that allows creatives to present their work, showcase testimonials, and provide a conversion-focused contact experience without backend dependencies.
roleAndResponsibilities: Smooth scroll and subtle motion effects
solutionStrategy: The template uses a component-driven architecture to ensure scalability and reusability. Smooth scrolling and subtle motion effects enhance user experience, while the layout prioritizes clarity, visual hierarchy, and high-impact project presentation. All pages are optimized for fast loading and responsiveness.
keyFeatures: Multi-page portfolio layout with Home, About, My Works, Single Work, Contact
Dedicated case study / single project pages
Client testimonial section for social proof
Fully responsive and mobile-optimized design
Modular, clean, and easy-to-customize structure
Fast-loading modern frontend architecture with smooth motion effects
performanceAndOptimization: Pages are optimized for fast load times, mobile responsiveness, and smooth animations. Modular components and clean markup ensure maintainable code and high performance across devices.
challengesAndLearnings: The main challenge was balancing minimal design with expressive visual flow while maintaining performance and modularity. This project strengthened my ability to build scalable portfolio templates that prioritize UX and high-impact presentation.
finalOutcome: Aaronn provides a professional, frontend-ready portfolio template for visual designers and creatives. It demonstrates polished UI design, modular architecture, smooth interactions, and SEO-optimized layouts.
idealUseCases: Creative agencies and portfolio showcase websites

meta.title: Aaronn – Visual Designer Portfolio Website Template
meta.description: Aaronn is a premium multi-page portfolio template for creatives, designed with Next.js/Vite and Tailwind CSS, featuring responsive layouts, smooth motion, and SEO-friendly frontend structure.

og.description: A premium multi-page portfolio template for visual designers and creative professionals with smooth animations and responsive design.

twitter.description: A modern, frontend-ready portfolio template for creatives, built with Next.js/Vite and Tailwind CSS, optimized for responsive design and smooth motion.

title: Consultiqo
projectSummary: Consultiqo is a sleek, modern, and fully responsive business consultancy website template. Built for agencies, startups, and freelancers, it delivers pixel-perfect design, SEO optimization, and a professional online presence without complex code.
overview: Consultiqo is a multi-page consulting and agency landing page template designed to provide a polished digital presence. Developed with Next.js 15 and Tailwind CSS, the template ensures smooth performance, responsive layouts, and SEO-friendly structure. Ideal for business consultancy firms, marketing agencies, startups, and freelancers, it offers pre-built sections including services, testimonials, achievements, lead capture forms, and statistics to showcase credibility and professionalism.
objective: The goal was to create a reusable, frontend-ready template that allows agencies and freelancers to quickly launch a professional website with engaging sections, conversion-focused CTAs, and clean layouts.
roleAndResponsibilities: Structuring multi-page layouts for consultancy needs
Smooth scrolling and animated transitions with HearthMotion
Preparing the template for easy customization by users
solutionStrategy: The template adopts a component-driven structure to ensure scalability, maintainability, and modularity. Pre-built sections include Home, Services, Single Service, Pricing/Plans, Contact, Authentication pages, and legal pages. Each section is designed to be easily editable via HTML/CSS for colors, fonts, spacing, images, and content, enabling rapid customization.
keyFeatures: Engaging hero/home section with actionable CTAs
Service & features showcase with clear layout
Client testimonials and social proof sections
Statistics and achievements display
Lead capture contact forms
SEO-friendly and responsive design
Modular and reusable components for easy customization
Frontend/UI only; ready for API/backend integration
performanceAndOptimization: Optimized for fast loading, responsive layouts, and smooth animations. Modular components and clean markup ensure maintainability, SEO visibility, and high performance across devices.
challengesAndLearnings: Balancing modularity, smooth animations, and clear conversion-focused sections was a key challenge. This project enhanced skills in designing professional agency templates with frontend-first approach and SEO optimization.
finalOutcome: Consultiqo is a professional, frontend-ready business consultancy website template that demonstrates modern design, modular architecture, SEO optimization, and smooth UX, enabling agencies and freelancers to launch their online presence quickly.

gettingStarted: Start local development server: npm run dev
Build for production (optional): npm run build
customization: Images: Replace files in /public or /assets folder
Design System: Modify global styles (globals.css or tailwind.config.js) for colors, fonts, spacing
Custom Styles: Edit component-specific CSS or Tailwind classes
HTML/JSX Content: Update pages and components for headings, sections, and text

meta.title: Consultiqo – Sleek Business Consultancy Website Template

twitter.description: A modern, responsive consultancy website template with SEO-friendly layouts, pre-built sections, and smooth animations for agencies and freelancers.
